name: Dependence
description:
Dependence is an alternative game about a person who suffers from drug addiction. 

It was made for University of Utah's Alternative Game Development class. Its purpose is to build empathy and de-stigmatize addiction.

Dependence is a story of someone who will do whatever it takes to feed their addiction. Addicts aren't bad people, they just need support.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Pick up/Interact: Left mouse button

Use Drugs: Space

Created by:

Nathan Ayoubi: Producer/Designer/Artist

Hannah Feder: Artist/Designer/Concept Creator

Devyn Lehrman: Programmer/Designer

Spencer Higgins: Music
